title: Caroline Flack flaunts her toned legs in a tiny miniskirt as she steps out in Manchester
text:
She set tongues wagging earlier this month after being spotted in a blazing row with her beau, Lewis Burton, 27, during a boat trip in Ibiza.

But Caroline Flack, 39, looked in high spirits as she stepped out in Manchester after leaving a television studio on Friday.

The Love Island presenter showed off her envy-inducing legs in a black thigh-skimming skirt and brown suede ankle boots.

Caroline added to the look by keeping warm with a cosy Burberry scarf and fur-lined khaki Parker coat.

She wore an on-trend baker boy hat atop her blonde tresses while she was seen laughing on her way out of the studio.

Caroline's sighting comes after she recently penned on Instagram: 'Back from holiday... not quite as relaxing as I thought but ready to jump back into work! NEWWWWW JOB THIS WEEK... all to be revealed soon... see you later.'

The couple appeared to have several heated chats during the afternoon on the boat, as later on Caroline was pictured wearing a colourful striped kaftan as they continued their discussion.

It is unknown what Caroline and her former tennis star beau were talking about, however at one stage the TV presenter held up her phone and was showing Lewis something on the screen.

On the subject of their blossoming relationship, a source recently told The Sun: 'Caroline and Lewis were introduced through mutual friends and have really hit it off.

'They’ve been on several dates now and are getting on really well. Lewis has been a true gent to Caroline and has patiently waited to see her. They feel comfortable in each other’s company and it seems to be going in the right direction.'
